title: NESA Acupuncture Treatment Center | MCPHS
description: Our Acupuncture Treatment Center offers treatments for acute and chronic conditions in a peaceful, healing environment.
cleaned_text: The NESA Acupuncture Treatment Center provides acupuncture and herbal medicine for a variety of conditions in a peaceful, healing environment. Acupuncture services are provided by student interns in their final year of training and closely supervised by a licensed acupuncturist. You can expect your individualized treatments to be comfortable, safe, and effective. Services Offered Acupuncture The use of fine needles and adjunctive techniques for the treatment of numerous conditions. Treatment styles include Chinese, Japanese as well as Orthopedic acupuncture. Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Medicine With private treatment rooms, seasonal Chinese herbal tea, books, herbal remedies, welcoming staff, and a peaceful setting, our center offers an educational and healing environment.
